data.name: The Appraiser Demo
data.detailed_description: The Appraiser Demo is a short audio tour of the upcoming game: The Appraiser. Explore the art gallery and listen to developer commentary to learn more about the game!
data.about_the_game: The Appraiser Demo is a short audio tour of the upcoming game: The Appraiser. Explore the art gallery and listen to developer commentary to learn more about the game!
